Kevin Lawrence wrote:

> I find that the stack trace gives me plenty of information to understand
> the failure and that more text is not necessarily better.

Yes. I prefer to let line numbers be my guide. When that's not enough, 
however, ...

> Of course, if I can't find a way to make the test clearer, I'll add a
> message to the assertion :-)

Exactly, and we have been talking about what that message should read.
